parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The random lock-up of brake calipers can cause the vehicle to pull to one side, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: The brake caliper locks up randomly
the vehicle pulls to one side
the brakes grab or seize
the vehicle is difficult to control
the ABS light illuminates on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the automatic transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to control, and potentially leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission makes a loud noise
the transmission does not engage into gear
the transmission slips or hesitates
the vehicle is unable to move or loses power
the vehicle is unable to go in reverse.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the axle can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to control, and potentially leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The axle makes a loud noise
the axle vibrates or shakes
the vehicle is unable to move or loses power
the vehicle is unable to go in reverse.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the heater core can cause hot water to flow into the passenger compartment, leading to burns and injuries to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: Hot water or coolant leaking into the passenger compartment
sudden burst of hot water or steam
burns or injuries to the driver and passengers.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The short circuit of the windshield wiper switch can cause a fire in the passenger compartment, posing a risk to the safety of the driver and passengers.
symptoms: Smoke or flames coming from the dashboard or windshield wiper area
burning smell or electrical odor
malfunctioning or stuck windshield wipers.
